transcript.text: hi guys but now you guys have probably

my YouTube videos are private and my

I had someone reach out to me and kind
of flag me to some concerns which were
valid I had a family emergency of some
significance on Friday that I'm still
dealing with now and I all of a sudden
was in the middle of this craziness
which I just happened to piece
everything that was given together
correctly I didn't have anything special
didn't have anything additional didn't

everything together in the right way so
this is gonna be really short I wanted
to thank everybody for your support and
everything that you guys have done for
me over the past few T he's not even

things like this might be different but
